TopReViews.Title: Pepper Lunch is always a good idea
TopReViews.Comment:
When everything fails, just go for pepper lunch! Thats what I have learnt. The food will never fail you, nice and quick and good to eat! I love the basic rice, beef slices and added cheese! Yum! 
Just be aware of the sizzling and heat! It can burn your tongue no joke! ü§ó
